decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the combo pieces needed to play Omniscience and generate massive value by casting multiple spells for free. Marang River Regent, Moment of Truth, and Roiling Dragonstorm provide powerful spells to cast for free with Omniscience, while Confounding Riddle and Ephara's Dispersal help control the board. Stock Up and Meticulous Archive help dig for combo pieces, while Temporary Lockdown provides protection. Invasion of Arcavios can provide extra card advantage. The mana base is designed to support the casting of the deck's various spells.
